definition: forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
(bird species of China) golden-fronted leafbird (Chloropsis aurifrons)

sentences.english: A special camera mounted on a boom is swung into position above Corina's frontal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 一个特殊的相机被安装在了科瑞娜大脑额叶的位置上。

sentences.english: In rats brain mtr showed different values between pons and frontal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 并且在大白鼠脑显示出桥脑高于额叶。

sentences.english: Instead of imagining lobotomizing us, turning us into rats, suppose we just say, look, the problem is really this.
sentences.chinese: 这次不用额叶切除术把我们变成老鼠，问题的症结是。

sentences.english: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
sentences.chinese: 他首创了被称为额叶切断术的外科手术。

sentences.english: Perhaps the right kind of lobotomy would do the trick.
sentences.chinese: 适当的额叶切除术就能解决问题。

sentences.english: In frontal epileptic group, there were only 4 cases with mild hippocampal atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 额叶癫痫组仅4例有轻度海马萎缩。

sentences.english: Surgeons at Balad had removed the shrapnel-pierced part of his left frontal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 在巴拉德，医生取出了穿入他左额叶的弹片。

sentences.english: This pattern was not associated with frontal lobe dysfunction on neuropsychological testing.
sentences.chinese: 通过神经心理测试，认为这种行为和额叶障碍无关。

sentences.english: Of course, the lobotomy always had its critics.
sentences.chinese: 当然，额叶切除术的争议一直没有停止。

sentences.english: These days, lobotomies are no longer performed on the mentally ill.
sentences.chinese: 如今，额叶切除术已经不再用于精神疾病的治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the clinical traits of mesial frontal epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析内侧额叶癫痫发作的临床特征。

sentences.english: The only way to avoid that is to lobotomize me, and that's not desirable.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的解决方法是作额叶切除术，那不是我想要的。

sentences.english: Why, then, might old memories be transferred from the hippocampus to the frontal cortex?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么会旧的记忆会从海马转移到额叶皮层？

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operative treatment of cerebral contusion and laceration in frontal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨额叶脑挫裂伤的手术治疗方法。

sentences.english: The frontal corticoteetal fibers passed through the internal capsule and the cerebral peduncle.
sentences.chinese: 额叶皮质至顶盖的投射路经内囊和大脑脚。

sentences.english: The study centers on a part of the frontal lobecallscalled Broca's area.
sentences.chinese: 这份研究主要针对部分额叶，也叫布洛卡区。
